description: Prefer the description to contain the most important information or information related to what people focus on
Prefer comprehensive descriptions with more specific details
Prefer descriptions that align with visual cues
Prefer the descriptions that are more immersive
Prefer descriptions that contain safety or emergency information
Prefer descriptions for sounds that happen outside of sights
Dislike descriptions for sounds that happen outside of sights (because of distration)
Want to confirm with the imagination of the sounds "should happen in this scenario"
Feel information overloaded or get distracted by the descriptions with timestamps
Confused by the description because it doesn't fit well with what they perceive
Descriptions are too general, want in-depth information
Descriptions with timestamps are repetitive with same information
Feel description is not useful because it only provides something already known
Want contents of speech in the description when speech is presented
Use visual cues and descriptions to gain better understanding
Prefer summary because it's accurate and easy to understand
Prefer summary in common or stationary scenarios
Prefer descriptions with timestamps for moving or sequential or changing events
Prefer descriptions with timestamps when no speech is presented
Prefer both summary and description with timestamps at the same time for different benefits
Want more contexts of the sounds (e.g., for human speech, is it from a TV or there's someone speaking outside of sight)
Dislike the mismatch between the description with timestamps and the time the sound happens
SoundNarrattives could be useful for emergencies notification
SoundNarrattives could be useful for indoor activities
SoundNarratives could be useful for outdoor activities
